data.fullContent: Fashion is defined as the prevailing style of a particular time or any characteristic or custom style. In a general sense, fashion refers to a particular style in regard to clothing or accessories, but it is also the general term for all products related to trends and styles. A person who sells products based on evolving fashion trends or styles of the time is called a fashion merchandiser. The fashion merchandising profession is a type of business job within the clothing category. Fashion merchandisers work closely with professional designers and buy their products from the merchandise manufacturing companies, including accessories, clothing, jewelry, shoes, and any other fashion product retailers may need. Fashion merchandisers also work with fashion photographers, stylists, and clothing manufacturers to produce images that help sell these products, such as photographs for advertising campaigns and catalogs and sketches of clothing designs.
